As of June 2020, two phase III open-label trials (SIMPLE) are underway recruiting patients from countries with high infection rates/burden.
13, 17 The first trial is evaluating the safety and efficacy of remdesivir in hospitalized patients with severe COVID-19 infection, having oxygen saturation<94% and radiological proof of pneumonia. The second trial includes confirmed cases with moderate manifestations of COVID-19. Both studies have similar intravenous dosing regimens of 5-day and 10-day duration of therapy.
